data.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson.) [Breath] (max 4)
- At 15+ [Breath], gain Final Power +(highest Reson.) instead (max 4)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. / 2) [Breath] Count (max 2)
- At 5+ [Breath] Count, gain Coin Power +(highest Reson. / 2) instead (max 2)
[TargetKill] Gain 1 [HoldingBreath] next turn (2 times per turn)
data.name: Thoracalgia

descs: Deal +([Breath] Potency + Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max 20%)

data.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson.) [Breath] (max 6)
- At 15+ [Breath], gain Final Power +(highest Reson.) instead (max 6)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. / 2) [Breath] Count (max 3)
- At 5+ [Breath] Count, gain Coin Power +(highest Reson. / 2) instead (max 3)
[TargetKill] Gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn (6 times per turn)
data.name: Thoracalgia

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 2 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
data.name: Thoracalgia

descs: Deal +([Breath] Potency + Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max 20%)

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
- Gain 1 [Breath] for every ally targeted by this Skill (max 2)

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 4 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
- Recover half of SP used by this Skill
data.name: Thoracalgia

descs: Deal +([Breath] Potency + Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max 40%)

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
- Gain 2 [Breath] for every ally targeted by this Skill (max 4)

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 3 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 4 [Breath] and +4 [Breath] Count
- Recover SP used by this Skill and regain 1 of each E.G.O resources consumed
data.name: Thoracalgia

passiveList.desc:
Next Turn Start after using this E.G.O Skill: gain 1 [NebulizerInhale] (once per turn)
- If this Skill defeated enemies, gain additional [NebulizerInhale] equal to the number of targets defeated
- If this Skill defeated allies, gain (targets defeated x 2) additional [NebulizerInhale]
- This value Stacks over this Encounter's duration
passiveList.name: Breath
